description: Following reports, Krafton has officially delayed the Early Access release of Subnautica 2 out of 2025. To compensate, the title received its first gameplay teaser today as well. Read more...
title: Subnautica 2 officially delayed out of 2025, but gets a gameplay reveal

description: The second update that Bethesda promised for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered has just hit Steam, and it has plenty of bug fixes, difficulty options, and more. Read more...
title: Oblivion Remastered second update brings new difficulty options, performance fixes

description: AMD's Ryzen 5 9600X Zen 5 CPU is priced currently at just $156 making it an amazing deal. All you need is Amazon Prime. Read more...
title: AMD's Ryzen 9600X 6-core AM5 CPU is just $156 if you have Amazon Prime

description: Microsoft has announced a new major change for Windows 11 24H2 and upcoming versions like 25H2 that is meant to make the OS a lot more secure and faster on the web. Read more...
title: Microsoft just gave a big reason to upgrade to Windows 11 24H2 with faster, more secure web

description: GameStop has decided to sell the infamous stapler and other associated items with the Switch 2 launch day incident. The items are currently going for almost $17,000. Read more...
title: GameStop is selling infamous Nintendo Switch 2 stapler in crazy auction, now at $17,000

description: Nvidia has become the first company in the world to achieve a market capitalization of $4 trillion, way ahead of other formidable competitors. Read more...
title: Nvidia beats Microsoft and Apple to $4 trillion market cap

description: Apple has been developing a cheaper and faster version of the Vision Pro for some time, and a new report now suggests it could launch later this year. Read more...

description: A range of Odyssey gaming monitors from Samsung are currently selling at their new lowest prices with Prime Day deals. Read more...

description: Google is laying a new transatlantic internet cable between the US and Europe to boost its cloud infrastructure. Read more...
title: Google announces new transatlantic internet cable connecting US and Europe

description: Only hours after Grok sparked outrage with pro-Hitler comments, X CEO Linda Yaccarino has stepped down, ending her two-year run at the helm. Read more...
title: X CEO steps down just hours after Grok's pro-Hitler outburst

description: Microsoft has confirmed that certain M365 services like Teams have gone down. The company is investigating and has released some preliminary details. Read more...
title: Microsoft has just confirmed a Teams outage as it can't be accessed

description: Get help with all sorts of questions and tasks, making problem-solving and decision-making super easy. Earn free daily credits. Read more...

description: Perplexity has launched its Comet AI browser, but it's locked behind a prohibitively expensive subscription right now. Read more...

description: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, which looks a lot similar to the Galaxy Z Flip6, but with a lower price. Read more...

description: Samsung has officially launched the Galaxy Z Flip7 upgrade along with a new fan-edition device for the flip series. Read more...

description: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy Watch8 and Watch8 Classic, porting Watch Ultra's 'cushion' design to the rest of the lineup. Read more...

description: Samsung's latest flagship foldable, the Galaxy Z Fold7, is now official, and it boasts a much thinner design, an updated screen, and other improvements. Read more...

description: Do you have Amazon Prime membership and in need of a smartwatch upgrade? If so, check out the Google Pixel Watch 3 which is now 29% off. If you don't have Prime you can get a free trial here. Read more...
title: Google Pixel Watch 3 (45mm) gets 29% discount, for Prime members

description: Acer has released its consolidated revenues for June 2025 and some data for the first half of the year. it suggests that businesses are buying hardware ready for the Windows 10 end of life. Read more...
title: Acer's June revenue jumps 49.7% with strong commercial PC and Chromebook growth

description: A new report says people are moving away from US tech services, largely because of the political climate under President Donald Trump and his "America First" agenda. Read more...
title: Trump's "America First" agenda made people ditch US tech for Europe, Tuta claims

description: Vivaldi 7.5 has just received its second minor update since releasing six days ago. While minor updates aren't usually that interesting, this one seems to include lots usability improvements. Read more...
title: Vivaldi 7.5 gets second minor update to fix camera, tab, and mail bugs

description: Users need to be aware of an unofficial Windows reinstallation app that does not let the victims use their PC unless they pay. Read more...
title: Unofficial Windows reinstaller app locks you out of your Windows 11 PC until you pay

description: The UK government and Google Cloud have launched a partnership to help modernize the IT systems of the public sector. It'll help reduce the shocking number of PCs running legacy software. Read more...
title: UK partners with Google Cloud to ditch legacy IT and upskill 100,000 civil servants

description: Grok is once again in the spotlight for the wrong reasons. The LLM chatbot has been temporarily stripped of its text capabilities on X after it praised Hitler. Read more...
title: Musk disables Grok's text generation after 'anti-woke' chatbot praises Hitler

description: After the massive success of its hit F1 movie starring Brad Pitt, Apple now wants the U.S. rights to Formula 1 broadcasting. Read more...

description: Microsoft has finally brought a threaded view to channels, which works similar to Slack and Discord. There is also a rather weird enhancement related to the use of emoji. Read more...

description: Crucial X9 external SSD is only $103 for the 2TB model which makes it one of its lowest ever prices. Grab the deal before it's gone. Read more...

description: A fresh leak offers a glimpse into its Android Auto alternative, called Auto DeX, which may work even if your car doesn't support it. Read more...

description: Microsoft is seemingly implementing dynamic desktop backgrounds powered by AI in Windows 11, but it's unclear how they will function. Read more...

title: Microsoft Surface Pro (2024) 13-inch OLED is $455 off for Prime Day

description: The American Federation of Teachers (AFT), representing 1.8 million educators, has launched the National Academy for AI Instruction, backed by Microsoft, OpenAI, and Anthropic. Read more...

description: Microsoft has fixed an annoying problem related to Windows Firewall in the latest version of its OS. IT admins should no longer see faulty error events. Read more...
title: Latest Windows 11 Patch Tuesday fixes Firewall issue

description: Apple COO Jeff Williams is soon set to retire but the company has a plan to make the transition smooth. Williams has been at Apple for 27 years and working in the industry for 40 years. Read more...

description: Replit has partnered with Microsoft to expand its agentic software creation platform to enterprise customers who prefer Azure cloud platform. Read more...
